definition: to like/to take pleasure in/keen on/fond of/interest/hobby/appetite for/CL:個|个[ge4]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，写作的生活将继续捕捉爱好它的“落网之鱼”。

sentences.english: This announcement will arouse a feeling of anger among freedom-loving people.
sentences.chinese: 这一宣告将会激起爱好自由人们的愤怒。

sentences.english: After all, everyone needs a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 必竟，每个人都需要有一个业余爱好的。

sentences.english: Deception and deceptive, gradually became the most people.
sentences.chinese: 自欺与欺人，渐渐成了大多数人的爱好。

sentences.english: She’s also an avid street skateboarder.
sentences.chinese: 她还是一个热心的街头滑板爱好者。

sentences.english: But I suppose I became interested in taking the carving to another level.
sentences.chinese: 但是我觉得我对雕刻的爱好上升到了另一层面。

sentences.english: People in Beijing love orts and take an active part in orts.
sentences.chinese: 北京人爱好体育并积极参加体育活动。

sentences.english: And certain high-risk professions and hobbies usually have to be disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 某些高风险职业和业余爱好通常也必须予以说明澄清。

sentences.english: The tragedy of love between Jia Baoyu and Lin Daiyu is a great interest to the lovers of "Hong Xue"(study of A Dream of Red Mansions).
sentences.chinese: 宝黛爱情悲剧是“红学”爱好者最为关注的一个问题。

sentences.english: If you have free time then you can try new hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有空闲的时间，那么你可以试试新的爱好。

sentences.english: All chessplayers should have a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 所有棋手都应该有一项业余爱好。

sentences.english: From tuha oil field , like flute and vocality.
sentences.chinese: 来自吐哈油田，爱好长笛演奏和声乐。

sentences.english: Birding is a fun, rewarding hobby that is easy to get started with.
sentences.chinese: 观鸟是一种有趣而有益的爱好，也也很容易起步。

sentences.english: Country-music fans everywhere, know his big hits.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地音乐爱好者，知道他的点击率较高。

sentences.english: My hobby is a good safety-valve for the tension that builds up at work.
sentences.chinese: 我用业余爱好来消除工作中产生的紧张情绪。

definition: to be keen on/to have a passion for
to like/fond of/to prefer/to love/one's tastes/preference
personal strength/one's special ability or strong points
to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
to treasure/to be very fond of
